days.name: Day 1 - Winners Round 1
days.description: Year 5 Open Winners Round 1 featuring 6 tournament rounds. All rounds use the same map rotation: E-District (2) → Storm Point (2) → World's Edge (2).

matchups.title: Winners Round 1 #4

matchups.title: Winners Round 1 #6
matchups.description: Final round of Winners Round 1. Concluding the first day of competition.
